Name: Battle Imagine - Crimson Foxen
Description:
Use to activate or advance the Battle Imagine skill of the Crimson Foxen - Arcane! Fox Shadow Assault.

Arcane! Fox Shadow Assault
Summon Boss - Crimson Foxen, immediately dealing Attack Damage, then assisting the player in attacks for 15s. Can be commanded by the Marksman's Storm Arrow skill.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
